---
title: "status"
description: "Retrieves the status of the specified agent"
---



Queries the API for the current status of an agent using a validated agent ID.
The provided ID is confirmed (or obtained from the last response if needed), and the
resulting status is stored internally before being returned.



## Parameters

<ParamField path="agent_id" type="str" required>
  Unique identifier of the agent to check.
</ParamField>

## Returns

[`LegacyAgentStatusResponse`](/sdk-reference/misc/legacyagentstatusresponse): The current status information of the specified agent.

## Raises

- `ValueError`: If no valid agent ID can be determined.
